amendment.description: To amend the Homeland Security Act of 2002 to enhance cybersecurity, and for other purposes.

action.text: Amendment SA 3894 ruled non-germane by the chair.
Point of order raised in Senate with respect to amendment SA 3894.

Amendment SA 3894 proposed by Senator Reid for Senator Schumer. (consideration: CR S10044-10047; text: CR S10047) To amend the Homeland Security Act of 2002 to enhance cybersecurity, and for other purposes.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3894 proposed by Senator Reid for Senator Schumer.
